name: The Last Light (RAIL)
description:
Hello! This isn't actually anything really important-- I picked up Unity less than two weeks ago and this is the result; wanted to make something from start to finish to learn how to work with Unity, and the Halloween spirit inspired me to do something zombie related, so while it's kinda bland, I made sure to release it only when it had every basic quality function that makes things a game.

The premise is pretty simple, really; zombies have taken over, and you're the last survivor, about to die: See how long you can last. Has a high-score and time system to measure your progress, but feel free to delete it after playing it once or twice.

This is only the beginning!
